articles.title: US stock futures lead Asia lower, dollar gains on yen - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares slipped on Monday as global inflation angst favoured commodities as a hedge over U.S. equities, while rising U.S. bond yields lifted the dollar to two-and-a-half year peaks against the Japanese yen
